document_data.name: ''Powder of Good Taste''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|20}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Powder of good taste''''' was a type of magical powder used for culinary purposes.
document_data.Description: This powder had a white hue and it was packaged in packets.
document_data.Powers: Placing a single pinch of this powder on any {{SI|1|lbs.|k}} of food, no matter its condition, would cause it to taste delicious. Though the appearance of the food would not be altered.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Solimar]], a chef and wizard at the [[Ravens Bluff]] restaurant [[The Painted Boat]], owned some ''powder of good taste''.{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|19}}
